metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21440 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Generated Support Bundles contains private S/MIME and PGP keys ifcontaining folder is not hidden. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS))Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS7.0.x version 7.0.27 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.14 and priorversions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
